description.name: pepearbitrum
description.tagline: PEPE Token arbitrum Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto arbitrum-pepe Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept PEPE Token arbitrum directly on your website
Unique arbitrum/pepe receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your arbitrum/pepe wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
